title: Almond-Horchata-Chia Pudding wih Dark Fruits
directions: Preheat oven to 375F. Spread almonds on baking sheet and lightly toast for about 5 minutes.
Place in heat proof bowl with sugar and cinnamon stick. Top with boiling water, stir and allow flavours to infuse for 4-5 hours.
Line a sieve with several layers of cheesecloth and strain the mixture into a mdeium sized bowl. Stir in chia seeds. Let stand to thicken for about an hour. Cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days.
When ready to serve divide and top with fresh fruit and marmalade.
ingredients: 2 cups fresh dark fruits (blackberries, blueberries, figs)
